subject: Re: With out changing the excepted value in my code regularly
msgSnippet: ... code. I ... changing ... the ... me an ... yes, it depends on the database. The excepted data will be changed when the it is updated. This updation will be
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains762@...>
wrote:
>
> p_thanuja82 wrote:
> >
> >
> > Hi All,
> >
> > In my test case the excepted value will be changed frequently.
> > so I have to change my excepted data each and every time in my
code. I
> > dont want to go in to my code and change the excepted data.
> >
> > Instead of doing this, I want to get the data with out changing
> > it every time. Please suggest me any other methods with out
changing
> > the excepted data in my code.
>
> Why does your expected result change frequently? Does it depend on
the
> input or on some other dependency, like a database? Can you give
me an
> example of such a test?
> --
> J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca
> Your guide to software craftsmanship
> JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
> 2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
>

yes, it depends on the database. The excepted data will be changed
when the it is updated. This updation will be update frequently.

The below is my testcase please check it and suggest me

TestDisclosure.java
____________________



package com.everbank.disclosure.test;


import junit.framework.Test;
import junit.framework.TestSuite;
import com.everbank.disclosure.webservice.DisclosureService;
import org.custommonkey.xmlunit.XMLTestCase;

/**
* Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
* User: thanuja
* Date: May 10, 2007
* Time: 4:36:18 PM
* To change this template use File | Settings | File Templates.
*/
public class TestDisclosure extends XMLTestCase {
private DisclosureService ds;

/**
* This is single parameter constructor which is used to pass
string as parameter.
* @param str
*/

public TestDisclosure(String str){

super(str);
}

protected void setUp() throws Exception{
ds = new DisclosureService();
}
protected void tearDown() throws Exception {
ds=null;
}

/**
* This is the test case when we pass Disclosure ID = "ADV001".
* input is the string variable which is passing
* excepted is the string which is excepted
* @throws Exception
*/
public void testGivenDisclosureIDADV001() throws Exception{

String input = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?
>\n" +
"<LEGAL_DISCLOSURE VersionID=\"0.1\"
LegalDisclosureRequestType=\"DisclosureInformation\"
RequestDatetime=\"2005-01-08T17:19:01\" ResponseDatetime=\"2005-01-
08T17:20:01\" xmlns=\"http://disclosure.xml.everbank.com\" >\n" +
"\t<DISCLOSURE DisclosureID=\"ADV001\"
DisclosureName=\"Advisor FreeNet Checking - Intro\">\n" +
"\t\t<DISCLOSURE_DATA>The quoted annual percentage
yield (APY) is a special rate and will apply for three months after
account opening, and may change at any time prior to account
opening. During the 3-month period after account opening, the
special rate will be applied to the first $50,000 in your account
and any balance above $50,000 will receive the applicable ongoing
rate, based on the average collected daily balance on your account.
Any rate or any tier may change at any time without notice. This
special APY offer is available to first-time account holders only
and is limited to one account per household. Minimum opening
deposit of $1,500 is required.\n" +
"\t\t</DISCLOSURE_DATA>\n" +
"\t</DISCLOSURE>\n" +
"</LEGAL_DISCLOSURE> ";
String excepted="<LEGAL_DISCLOSURE VersionID=\"0.1\"
LegalDisclosureRequestType=\"DisclosureInformation\"
RequestDatetime=\"2005-01-08T17:19:01\" ResponseDatetime=\"2005-01-
08T17:20:01\" xmlns=\"http://disclosure.xml.everbank.com\">\n" +
" <DISCLOSURE DisclosureID=\"ADV001\"
DisclosureName=\"Advisor FreeNet Checking - Intro\">\n" +
" <DISCLOSURE_DATA>ADV001 Data from
database 0</DISCLOSURE_DATA>\n" +
" </DISCLOSURE>\n" +
"</LEGAL_DISCLOSURE>";

String result=ds.getDisclosureInformation(input);
/**
* This will compare the both string result and excepted
*/

try{
assertXMLEqual(excepted,result);
}
catch(Exception e){
System.out.print(e.toString());
}

}

/**
* This is the test case when we pass Disclosure ID = "ADV002".
* input is the string variable which is passing
* excepted is the string which is excepted
*/
public void testGivenDisclosureIDADV002(){

String input = "<?xml version=\"1.0\"
encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n" +
"<LEGAL_DISCLOSURE VersionID=\"0.1\"
LegalDisclosureRequestType=\"DisclosureInformation\"
RequestDatetime=\"2005-01-08T17:19:01\" ResponseDatetime=\"2005-01-
08T17:20:01\" xmlns=\"http://disclosure.xml.everbank.com\" >\n" +
"\t<DISCLOSURE DisclosureID=\"ADV002\"
DisclosureName=\"Advisor FreeNet Checking - Intro\">\n" +
"\t\t<DISCLOSURE_DATA>The quoted annual
percentage yield (APY) is a special rate and will apply for three
months after account opening, and may change at any time prior to
account opening. During the 3-month period after account opening,
the special rate will be applied to the first $50,000 in your
account and any balance above $50,000 will receive the applicable
ongoing rate, based on the average collected daily balance on your
account. Any rate or any tier may change at any time without notice.
This special APY offer is available to first-time account holders
only and is limited to one account per household. Minimum opening
deposit of $1,500 is required.\n" +
"\t\t</DISCLOSURE_DATA>\n" +
"\t</DISCLOSURE>\n" +
"</LEGAL_DISCLOSURE>";
String excepted="<LEGAL_DISCLOSURE VersionID=\"0.1
\" LegalDisclosureRequestType=\"DisclosureInformation\"
RequestDatetime=\"2005-01-08T17:19:01\" ResponseDatetime=\"2005-01-
08T17:20:01\" xmlns=\"http://disclosure.xml.everbank.com\">\n" +
" <DISCLOSURE DisclosureID=\"ADV002\"
DisclosureName=\"Advisor FreeNet Checking - Intro\">\n" +
"
<DISCLOSURE_DATA>HI</DISCLOSURE_DATA>\n" +
" </DISCLOSURE>\n" +
"</LEGAL_DISCLOSURE>";

String result=ds.getDisclosureInformation
(input);
/**
* This will compare the both string result and excepted
*/

try{
assertXMLEqual(excepted,result);
}
catch(Exception e){
System.out.print(e.toString());
}
}

/**
* This is the test case when we do not pass any Disclosure ID = " ".
* input is the string variable which is passing
* excepted is the string which is excepted
*/
public void testNoGivenDisclosureID(){

String input = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?
>\n" +
"<LEGAL_DISCLOSURE VersionID=\"0.1\"
LegalDisclosureRequestType=\"DisclosureInformation\"
RequestDatetime=\"2005-01-08T17:19:01\" ResponseDatetime=\"2005-01-
08T17:20:01\" xmlns=\"http://disclosure.xml.everbank.com\" >\n" +
"\t<DISCLOSURE DisclosureID=\"\"
DisclosureName=\"Advisor FreeNet Checking - Intro\">\n" +
"\t\t<DISCLOSURE_DATA>The quoted annual percentage
yield (APY) is a special rate and will apply for three months after
account opening, and may change at any time prior to account
opening. During the 3-month period after account opening, the
special rate will be applied to the first $50,000 in your account
and any balance above $50,000 will receive the applicable ongoing
rate, based on the average collected daily balance on your account.
Any rate or any tier may change at any time without notice. This
special APY offer is available to first-time account holders only
and is limited to one account per household. Minimum opening
deposit of $1,500 is required.\n" +
"\t\t</DISCLOSURE_DATA>\n" +
"\t</DISCLOSURE>\n" +
"</LEGAL_DISCLOSURE>";
String excepted="<LEGAL_DISCLOSURE VersionID=\"0.1\"
LegalDisclosureRequestType=\"DisclosureInformation\"
RequestDatetime=\"2005-01-08T17:19:01\" ResponseDatetime=\"2005-01-
08T17:20:01\" xsi:nil=\"true\"
xmlns=\"http://disclosure.xml.everbank.com\"
xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\">\n" +
" <MESSAGE message=\" is INVALID, NO DATA
EXISTS\" type=\"error\"/>\n" +
"</LEGAL_DISCLOSURE>";

String result=ds.getDisclosureInformation(input);

/**
* This will compare the both string result and excepted
*/

try{
assertXMLEqual(excepted,result);
}
catch(Exception e){
System.out.print(e.toString());
}
}

public static Test suite() {
return new TestSuite(TestDisclosure.class);
}
}
